cut -f[n] -d"[x]"
assumes your string is limited by characters "X", and you want to extract field n from it.


$echo "THIS_IS_A_STRING_OF_CHARACTERS " | cut -f1 -d"_"


$ echo "THIS_IS_A_STRING_OF_CHARACTERS " | cut -f1 -d"_"
